1.02.name: wordpress/tintin-quotes
1.02.description: Billions of Blue Blistering Barnacles! The Tintin Quotes widget will display a random insult from all the Tintin quotes in the database. The plugin comes with 235 insults from Captain Haddock and 4 quotes from Sir Francis Haddock. All the quotes were sourced from tintinologist.org, a great site!
